overview: Smosh: Under The Influence was live sketch and variety show that was hosted by the Smosh Family and aired on June 30, 2022 via Kiswe, a livestreaming and live experiences platform. It is Smosh's first livestream show since Smosh Live in 2016. The livestream featured sketches and shows from across the Smosh channels with the added twist of everyone getting drunk on the show.
title: Smosh: Under the Influence
